subject: Mathematics
question_text: The solution from the following with highest depression in freezing point/lowest freezing point is 180 g of acetic acid dissolved in 1   L of 180 g of acetic acid dissolved in benzene 180 g of benzoic acid dissolved in benzene 180 g of glucose dissolved in water
question_latex: The solution from the following with highest depression in freezing $\frac{point}{lowest}$ freezing point is 180 g of acetic acid dissolved in 1   L of 180 g of acetic acid dissolved in benzene 180 g of benzoic acid dissolved in benzene 180 g of glucose dissolved in water
